Stratagems.title: Cycle of Slaughter
Stratagems.desc: Use this Tactic at the end of the Fight phase. Pick a Tzaangor from your kil team - that model can immediately fight an additional time.

Stratagems.title: Hungering Warpflame
Stratagems.desc: Use this Tactic in the Shooting phase when you choose a model in your kill team to shoot with a warpflamer or warpflame pistol. Until the end of the phase, you can roll two dice when determining the number of attacks made by that weapon and pick the highest result.

Stratagems.title: Immovable Automaton
Stratagems.desc: Use this Tactic when a Rubric Marine or Rubric Marine Gunner, Scarab Occult Terminator or Scarab Occult Gunner from your kill team is taken out of action. Roll a D6. On a 4+ that model suffers a flesh wound instead.

Stratagems.title: Malicious Familiar
Stratagems.desc: Use this Tactic at the end of the Movement phase. Pick an enemy model within 1"" of your Leader and roll a D6. On a 4+ that enemy model suffers 1 mortal wound.

Stratagems.title: Sorcerous Focus
Stratagems.desc: Use this Tactic at the start of your turn in the Psychic phase. Pick a Psyker model from your kill team that is within 2"" of at least two other models from your kill team. Add 6"" to the range of this model's Psybolt psychic power until the end of the phase.

Stratagems.title: Veterans of the Long War
Stratagems.desc: Use this Tactic when a Chaos Space Marine or Terminator model from your kill team is chosen to attack in the Shooting or Fight phase. You can add 1 to wound rolls for the model's attacks that target Imperium models until the end of the phase.

Stratagems.title: Teleport Strike
Stratagems.desc: Use this Tactic at the end of the Movement phase. Choose up to three Terminator models from your kill team that were set up in Reserve and set them up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 5"" away from any enemy models.

Stratagems.title: Shield of Desecration
Stratagems.desc: Use this Tactic at the begining of the Shooting phase if a Psyker from your kill team other than a shaken model is within 1"" of a Fallen Statue. Until the end of the phase, add 1 to any saving throws you make for models from your kill team that are within 3"" of that Fallen Statue.
